description:
Mike seems pretty excited about what new recruit Shawn holds in store. Shawn is 26, weighs around 175 lbs and stands around 5'8'. When Mike asks if he's ever done anything with another guy before, Shawn confesses to having a buddy that he grew up with that used to suck him off sometimes. Shawn says he might have penetrated his friend a couple of times too!

Mike is on his best behavior today, asking Shawn if he can get him anything before he leaves him to it. Once Mike is gone, Shawn puts on a nice show for us with lots of showing off and hot moaning. Mike already has big plans for him, but he's decided to let Shawn go ahead and rub one out real quick for us so all of you can get to know him a little better first!
title: Shawn
